channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Header Footer Code Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Header Footer Code Manager

item.title: CVE-2021-24791|2024-08-03T19:42:17.170Z -- unknown -- header%20footer%20code%20manager
item.description: The Header Footer Code Manager WordPress plugin before 1.1.14 does not validate and escape the "orderby" and "order" request parameters before using them in a SQL statement when viewing the Snippets admin dashboard, leading to SQL injections
